name: Battleship Bishojo
summary: Join the girls on a non-stop naval adventure to unravel the secrets of both the legendary creatures and the truth about the world inhabited by the battleship Bishojo! You can expect swashbuckling action, twists, ecchi humour and - of course - plenty of fanservice!
